AD_PrisonComment.synopsis: The spirit in the amulet comments on the prison in Moonrise Towers
AD_PrisonComment.how_to_trigger: Enter the central part of the Moonrise prison while wearing the amulet

AD_PrisonComment_0.speaker: Sentient Amulet
AD_PrisonComment_0.text: Hohohoooo! Conditions most grim, courtesy of Ketheric Thorm.
